backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality implemented yet.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: comprehensive dark theme with purple accents, animated welcome screen with glowing effects, and upgraded dashboard with quest cards, XP animations, and notifications.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose and key features including routing, pages, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with base layer defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using oklch color space values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the LevelUp app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining routes for Welcome, Dashboard, Chat, Leaderboard, and Profile pages with a layout wrapper that includes bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with four tabs (Home, Chat, Leaderboard, Profile) featuring dark background, purple active state glow, and route-based highlighting.
frontend/src/components/ChatBubble.tsx: Reusable chat message component with conditional styling for user messages (purple, right-aligned) and AI messages (dark card with glow, left-aligned).
frontend/src/components/LeaderboardEntry: Leaderboard player entry displaying rank with medal emojis for top 3, player info, and conditional glow effects (gold/silver/bronze for podium, purple for current player).
frontend/src/components/QuestCard.tsx: Quest card with dark background, purple left border glow, checkbox with pop animation, fire emoji streak display, and XP reward indicator.
Animated typing indicator with three pulsing purple dots in a dark card bubble for AI chat loading state.
frontend/src/components/XPNotification.t: Centered popup notification displaying XP gained amount with purple gradient background, glow effect, and fade-in/zoom animation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing ICP backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatic refetching on identity changes, and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeminiChat.ts: Custom hook for Gemini API integration with sendMessage function, loading state, and SYSTEM persona configuration for dramatic anime mentor-style responses.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks with no current implementation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom dark theme variables and utility classes for neon glow effects (purple/blue), shadows, and animations for a cyberpunk/gaming aesthetic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/Chat.tsx: Chat interface page with AI assistant using Gemini API, featuring message history, typing indicators, and auto-scrolling conversation display.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard displaying player stats, XP progress bar, and active quests with completion tracking and XP reward notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Leaderboard page showing ranked list of top 10 players with their levels and XP, highlighting the current player's position.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Placeholder profile page with 'Coming Soon' message and centered icon display.
frontend/src/pages/Welcome.tsx: Landing page with animated gradient background, floating particles, and call-to-action button to navigate to the dashboard.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a dark theme with purple/blue neon colors, custom color palette using OKLCH values, container settings, border radius variables, and accordion animations with typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting a React-based gamified self-improvement app called 'LevelUp' with dark RPG/anime aesthetics, listing implemented features including welcome screen, dashboard with XP system, bottom navigation, chat integration with Gemini API, and particle effects.
